casebody.data:
WILLIAMS PONTIAC COMPANY and Bruce L. Sanft
v.
PATRIOT BUICK PONTIAC GMC, INC. Bruce L. Sanft
v.
Patriot Buick Pontiac GMC, Inc. Petition of: Williams Pontiac Company and Bruce L. Sanft No. 651 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 18, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 18th day of March, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
